InternetConnectionManager
          The InternetConnectionManager provides information about the connectivity to the Redpin server.
InternetConnectionManager.ConnectivityChecker
          AsyncTask responsible for explicitly checking the connection to the Redpin server by simply opening a socket to it and closing it again.

PerformRequestTask
          PerformRequestTask is a specialized AsyncTask to perform an server request on the background

          Supported redpin request types

          Class representing a response from the server.
